title: Themeable header logo using uploaded logo.svg (primary brand color)

requirements.summary: Update the header logo to use the uploaded logo.svg via a canonical asset path and render in primary brand color using a themeable currentColor/text-primary approach across breakpoints.
acceptanceCriteria: On all breakpoints, the header logo renders visually (no alt-text-only rendering) and links to `/`.
The header logo color is exactly the primary brand color (#2E0527) in normal/light mode.
The solution uses a themeable approach (e.g., `currentColor` / `text-primary` or equivalent) rather than an inline `color` style on an `` element.
Only one canonical logo asset path is used by the header logo implementation, and it resolves without 404s in the deployed build.

file_operations.description: Refactor UtthanLogo to render the uploaded logo.svg as a themeable graphic using currentColor (e.g., via the existing CSS mask approach) instead of a plain , and ensure it supports applying `text-primary` for the exact #2E0527 color in light mode.

Replace the inline-styled logo with the UtthanLogo component, ensure the logo link navigates to `/`, and apply `text-primary` (and responsive sizing) so the logo is correctly colored and visible on both desktop and mobile; remove any inline `style={{ color: ... }}` usage.

Update the `.logo-themed` utility to use a single canonical logo asset path (aligning with the header logo implementation), ensuring it points to the uploaded `logo.svg` and remains themeable via `background-color: currentColor`.
